additionalInformation: Wraith Band automatically upgrades on the 25th minute mark.

The item's attributes grants the following bonuses: 40/80 health and 0.2/0.4 health regeneration. 24/48 mana and 0.1/0.2 mana regeneration. 11/22 attack speed bonus and 2.83/5.67 main armor. 5/10 main attack damage to heroes and 2/4 main attack damage to / heroes respectively.
